de.must.markup
Class UIManager

java.lang.Object
  de.must.markup.UIManager

public class UIManager
extends java.lang.Object

Central control of what markupable components have to look like. Most importend aspect is the kind of markup language that is used. Intended to support variable distinction of different markup languages in a future step.
